title: Sorekara (1985)
description:
Plot: 30-year-old Daisuke, having selflessly forfeited the woman he loves when a classmate, Hiraoka, expressed an interest in her, now devotes his attention to literature, philosophy, and geishas. Living off the fortune that his father and brother amassed under the nascent Japanese capitalism he so despises, Daisuke refuses to find work or a wife. When Hiraoka shows up again, jobless, with his wife, Daisuke's passions for the woman resurface. Michiyo, trapped in an unfulfilling marriage to an arrogant man she never loved, and recovering from a recent miscarriage, goes to Daisuke for loans behind her husbandÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s back. Daisuke accommodates her needs, but his sense of decorum, his fear of an outcast and penniless future, and MichiyoÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s inscrutable agenda forever delay his acting on his feelings.
